resources.string: Starting from Android 6, the system requires apps to be granted location access in order to scan for BLE devices.\n\nYour location is never used aside from enabling the app to perform BLE scans.
Starting from Android 12, the system requires apps to be granted Nearby Devices access in order to scan for and connect to BLE devices.
Prior requests for required permissions have been repeatedly or permanently denied. You\'ll need to manually grant the app these permissions from the app\'s Settings screen.
Unable to launch app settings, please navigate to app settings manually
Disconnected or unable to connect to %1$s.
